subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Ben Gordon, the Chicago Bulls guard, is the latest N.B.A. player to be selected by the fledgling British basketball team that is trying to qualify for the 2012 Olympics. Gordon, who turns 25 on Friday, moved to the United States shortly after he was born in London. A college star at Connecticut, he was one of two Bulls players to appear in all 82 games last season, averaging 21.4 points.
